page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: Walpole is fairly quiet and away from main roads,but CARS are the most common type of transport.Nearly every family has one.Nearly all of the children have a BICYCLE and 40% cycle to school in the summer.The most popular kind of bicycle is B.M.X. A few of the children own their own PONIES and ride them for pleasure. There are no TRAINS now.The Sutton Bridge _ Kings Lynn line was closed in the 1960's.A few men keep BOATS ON THE RIVER Nene mainly for fishing.Still the most common form of moving about the village is on FOOT.There is a BUS service to Wisbech and Kings - Lynn.The Wisbech bus runs daily but the Kings - Lynn service is Tuesday and Saturday only.
